About Me

👋 Hi I’m Andy Rae, I work in film helping connect cinemas and audiences.

🎬 I work at BFI Film Hub Midlands, based at Broadway Nottingham.

🔎 I’m currently making Film Research, a library of film research, reports, and data sets from the UK film industry.

📈 I also occasionally write about using data to find things out.

☕️ I like to meet new people. Let me know if you want to grab a coffee.
